Name: Random Seed
Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies the initializing seed for the generation of random numbers. If 0 is specified, Korali will automatically derivate a new seed base on the current time.

Name: Results Output
Path
Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies the path of the results directory.

Name: Results Output
Frequency
Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies how often (in generations) will partial result files be saved on the results directory. The default, 1, indicates that every generation's results will be saved.

Name: Distributions
Configuration Settings.Description: Represents the distributions to use during execution.

Name: Problem
Configuration Settings.Description: Represents the configuration of the problem to solve.

Name: Solver
Configuration Settings.Description: Represents the state and configuration of the solver algorithm.

Name: Conduit
Configuration Settings.Description: Represents the configuration of the execution conduit.

Name: Console Output
Verbosity

Options.Description: Prints no information to console, except in case of errors.
Prints minimal information about the progress of the engine.
Prints information about the progress of the engine, plus information on the solver/problem.
Prints detailed information about the progress of the engine, plus detailed information on the solver/problem.

Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies how much information will be displayed on console when running Korali.

Name: Console Output
Frequency
Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies how often (in generations) will partial results be printed on console. The default, 1, indicates that every generation's results will be printed.

Name: Results Output
Profiling

Options.Description: Calculates and stores no profiling information.
Stores all the raw data about the execution of Korali to produce a timeline or perform an in-depth analysis.

Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies the level of detail of profiling information to gather and store.

Name: Name
Variables Configuration.Description: Defines the name of the variable.

Name: Timestamp
Internal Settings.Description: Indicates the current time when saving a result file.

Name: Run ID
Internal Settings.Description: Specifies the Korali run's unique identifier. Used to distinguish run results when two or more use the same output directory.

Name: Current Generation
Internal Settings.Description: Indicates the current generation in execution.

Name: Is Finished
Internal Settings.Description: Indicates whether execution has reached a termination criterion.
